item.title: Project 1: Data Science Salary Estimator
item.description: Created a tool that estimates data science yada yada yada Scraped over 1000 job descriptions from glassdoor using python and selenium Engineered features from the text of each jo description to quantify the value companies put on python excel aws and spark Optimized Linear, Lasso and Random Forest Regressors using GridsearchCV to reach the best model Built a client facing API using flask output Link to Github repository
